title: Logitech's terrible Steam Deck competitor just got even worse... (Plus other Steam Deck news)

media:group.media:title: Logitech's terrible Steam Deck competitor just got even worse... (Plus other Steam Deck news)
media:group.media:description:
There was a ton of Steam Deck news this week. So let's review it all together!

# What are your machines specs?
Office Rig:
 * AMD Ryzen 7 1800x
 * MSI Pro Series X370 SLI PLUS
 * AMD RX VEGA 64
 * GSkill Ripjaw V DDR4 8GB x4 (32 GB)
 * Fractal Design Define R9 Case
 * Manjaro GNOME

Living Room Gaming Rig:
 * ASUS X99-E-10G WS
 * Intel Core i7-6900K @ 3.2GHz
 * NVidia Titan X (Pascal)
 * DDR4 Corsair Vengeance RGB 8GB x8 (64GB)

Backup Rig
* System76 Thelio Minor
* AMD Ryzen 5 3400G
* DDR4 16GB RAM
* Zotac Nvidia GTX 970 4GB

Home Server:
 * ASUS M5A78L-M/USB3
 * AMD FX 6300 at 3.5 GHz
 * Nvidia GTX 750 1GB
 * DDR3 20 GB RAM
